But now after months of negotiations, the European Parliament has overwhelmingly approved two new landmark bills, the Digital Services Act, known as the DSA, and the Digital Markets Act, known as the DMA. Now the Digital Services Act focuses on big tech companies like Apple, Amazon and Facebook's owner Meta, forcing them to be more proactive when it comes to content moderation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
